title: Champion quotes that take have a different meaning with ( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°)
body:
Post below champion quotes that sound completely differant once you add ( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°)

Examples:
{{champion:36}} Mundo goes where he pleases  ( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°)
{{champion:126}} I'm going to enjoy this. ( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°)
{{champion:81}}  Time to get our hands dirty.( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°)

replies.body:
{{champion:40}} For only 2.95 a minute, I will leave you... breathless ( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°)

What do you mean there's no difference?

{{champion:223}} I am enthralled by your class and refinement: I must offer you a token of my admirations.
{{champion:154}} I'm not as squishy as I look.
{{champion:154}} I may bend, but I don't break.
{{champion:154}} Mom always said I was big for my age.
{{champion:154}} This is gonna get messy.

You forgot the ( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°).

( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°)
I don't know why, but I dislike the face. It's a trigger.

{{champion:55}}: I like it. ( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°)
{{champion:22}}: Check this out.  ( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°)
{{champion:15}}: Make me work for it. ( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°)

{{champion:37}}: ♫ ( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°)
{{champion:33}} Ok ( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°)
{{champion:54}} Rock solid ( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°)

{{champion:90}} Bow to the Void or be consumed by it.( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°)
{{champion:19}} It's only fun if they run.( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°)
{{champion:412}} Torment comes in so many flavors.( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°)
{{champion:12}} You can't milk those.( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°)

{{champion:115}} What do you mean this doesn't look safe? ( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°)
{{champion:117}} Yup, that tasted purple. ( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°) {{champion:45}} ( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°)
{{champion:18}} Is that a rocket in your pocket? ( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°)
{{champion:23}} My right arm is a lot stronger then my left arm! ( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°)
{{champion:89}} Don't stare directly at me for too long. ( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°)
{{champion:223}} I must sample this buffet. ( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°)
{{champion:6}} Destination received. ( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°)
That ziggs one was perfect.

>

{{champion:1}} You wanna play too? It'll be fun! ( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°)
{{champion:103}} ( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°)

Vi stands for vice ( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°)
Come on! Resist arrest already! ( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°)

Nice shot, cupcake. ( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°)

{{champion:254}}
{{champion:14}} I'll grind you to dust. ( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°)
{{champion:157}} This blade doesn't get any shorter ( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°)
It's "lighter". Duh.
{{champion:18}} "Watch where you're exploding, Ziggs!" ( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°)
{{champion:432}} *_chimes seductively_* ( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°)

Almost every Lee Sin line could be ( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°)
1. Your will, my hands
2. Strike firmly
3. Their heartbeats quicken
4. Extend your senses
( ͡~ ͜ʖ ͡°)( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°)( ͡~ ͜ʖ ͡°)( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°)( ͡~ ͜ʖ ͡°)( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°)( ͡~ ͜ʖ ͡°)( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°)( ͡~ ͜ʖ ͡°)( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°)( ͡~ ͜ʖ ͡°)( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°)( ͡~ ͜ʖ ͡°)( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°)

His quotes sound like Fifty Shades of Grey.

"Force is meaningless without skill"

{{champion:11}}  my blade is yours ( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°)

{{champion:103}} Don't you trust me? ( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°)
If you'd like to play with me, you'd better be sure you know the game. ( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°)
Don't hold back. ( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°)


I think Ahri has the largest bank of innuendo (or ( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°))
I am pretty sure the ( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°) is implied with most of Ahri's quotes.
